subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The bicycle maker Trek filed a lawsuit Tuesday to sever ties with Greg LeMond, the three-time Tour de France winner, saying his outspokenness about doping had weakened the brand. LeMond sued Trek in March, accusing the company of breaching its contract and asking for an injunction to prevent it from ending the deal.
